trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that can manage design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: 提供可以管理设计时序列化的接口。

trans-unit.source: A designer can utilize <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> to access services useful to managing design-time serialization processes.
trans-unit.target: 设计器可以利用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>访问服务对于管理设计时序列化过程很有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, a class that implements the designer serialization manager can use this interface to create objects, look up types, identify objects, and customize the serialization of particular types.
trans-unit.target: 例如，实现设计器的序列化管理器的类可以使用此接口来创建对象、 查找类型、 标识对象和自定义特定类型的序列化。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> to serialize and deserialize Code DOM statements.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>进行序列化和反序列化代码 DOM 语句。

trans-unit.source: The serialization provider to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的序列化提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 向序列化管理器添加指定的序列化提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将自定义序列化提供程序添加到序列化管理器。

trans-unit.source: Serialization providers can provide custom serializers for a particular type of object or set of types of objects.
trans-unit.target: 序列化提供程序可以为特定类型的对象或特定类型的对象集提供自定义序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: During serialization, each custom serialization provider is queried to return a serializer for a specific data type, if it can provide one.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化期间，将查询每个自定义序列化提供程序，以便为特定数据类型返回一个序列化程序（如果自定义序列化提供程序可以提供序列化程序的话）。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager uses the custom serializer provided by this method before using the default serializer for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理器在为特定类型使用默认序列化程序之前，使用此方法提供的自定义序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between serializers.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于堆栈的、用户定义的存储区域，该区域对于序列化程序之间的通信十分有用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack" /> that stores data.
trans-unit.target: 存储数据的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack" />。

trans-unit.source: This storage area provides communication of object context information to serializers.
trans-unit.target: 此存储区向序列化程序提供的对象的上下文信息的通信。

trans-unit.source: Context information about objects that are being serialized can be stored and accessed through this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>.
trans-unit.target: 有关要序列化的对象的上下文信息可以存储和访问通过此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ContextStack>。

trans-unit.source: The data type to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the constructor for this type.
trans-unit.target: 要传递到此类型的构造函数的参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: This name can be used to access the object later through <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 此名称可用于以后通过 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetInstance(System.String)" /> 访问该对象。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" /> is passed, the object is still created but cannot be accessed by name.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了 <see langword="null" />，则仍将创建该对象，但无法按名称访问它。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, this object is added to the design container.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则该对象将被添加到设计容器中。

trans-unit.source: The object must implement <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 该对象必须实现 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> 才能使此功能生效。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type and adds it to a collection of named instances.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定类型的实例并将其添加到已命名实例的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The newly created object instance.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的对象实例。

trans-unit.source: Objects that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> are added to the design-time container if the `addToContainer` parameter is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 对象实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>被添加到设计时容器如果`addToContainer`参数是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of a created object of the specified name, or <see langword="null" /> if that object does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定名称的已创建对象的实例，如果该对象不存在则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the object with the given name, or <see langword="null" /> if no object by that name can be found.
trans-unit.target: 具有给定名称的对象的实例，如果按该名称无法找到任何对象则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to retrieve must have been set through a prior call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的对象的名称必须通过调用设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The object to retrieve the name for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其名称的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the specified object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object has no name.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定对象的名称，如果该对象不具有名称则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 对象的名称，如果对象是未命名的，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object to get the serializer for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取序列化程序的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the serializer to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的序列化程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a serializer of the requested type for the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 为指定对象类型获取所请求类型的序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested serializer, or <see langword="null" /> if no appropriate serializer can be located.
trans-unit.target: 请求的序列化程序的实例，如果不能找到任何适当的序列化程序，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the type to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的类型的完全限定名。

trans-unit.source: Gets a type of the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定名称的类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the type, or <see langword="null" /> if the type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该类型的实例，如果无法加载该类型，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates custom properties that can be serializable with available serializers.
trans-unit.target: 指示可利用可用序列化程序进行序列化的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> containing the properties to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 包含要进行序列化的属性的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can contain an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可包含空集合。

trans-unit.source: A serializer should never assume that such properties exist.
trans-unit.target: 序列化程序也不应假定存在这样的属性。

trans-unit.source: A derived class or implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> defines the set of properties that are exposed here.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类或实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>定义的此处公开的属性集。

trans-unit.source: This property can be populated by user code.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以由用户代码填充。

trans-unit.source: It may be sufficient to call <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(System.Type)" /> of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> to populate this collection.
trans-unit.target: 它可能不足以调用<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(System.Type)" />的<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" />来填充此集合。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager must return an empty collection if no custom properties exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有自定义属性存在，序列化管理器必须返回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The provider to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This object must have been added using <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider)" />.
trans-unit.target: 该对象必须已使用 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.AddSerializationProvider(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationProvider)" /> 添加过。

trans-unit.source: Removes a custom serialization provider from the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 从序列化管理器移除自定义的序列化提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The error to report.
trans-unit.target: 要报告的错误。

trans-unit.source: This information object can be of any object type.
trans-unit.target: 该信息对象可以是任何对象类型。

trans-unit.source: If it is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是一个异常，则将提取该异常的消息并报告给用户。

trans-unit.source: If it is any other type, <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> is called to display the information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是任何其他类型，则将调用 <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" />，向用户显示该信息。

trans-unit.source: Reports an error in serialization.
trans-unit.target: 报告序列化中的错误。

trans-unit.source: If the serialization manager supports logging multiple errors in its implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ReportError%2A>, it can store the error information object for a future report where all the errors encountered can be displayed at once.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理器是否支持多个错误记录在其实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ReportError%2A>，它可以存储将来的报表可以一次显示遇到的所有错误的位置错误信息对象。

trans-unit.source: If this method stores multiple errors, serialization can continue after a call to this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法可以存储多个错误，可以在调用此方法后继续序列化。

trans-unit.source: If this method does not support logging multiple errors, this method should throw an exception, which aborts serialization.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法不支持日志记录多个错误，则此方法应引发异常，这将中止序列化。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager should never throw an exception for errors encountered during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理器应永远不会引发异常的序列化过程中遇到错误。

trans-unit.source: It should only throw an exception during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 它应只引发反序列化过程中的出现异常。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, users become confused because saving the document should never fail.
trans-unit.target: 否则，会变得混淆，因为保存的文档的用户应永远不会失败。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetName(System.Object)" /> cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager's name table.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.GetName(System.Object)" /> 无法在序列化管理器的名称表中找到指定名称时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event provides a way for a serializer to create an object on demand, so that the serializer does not have to order object creation by dependency.
trans-unit.target: 此事件为序列化程序提供按需创建对象的方法，以便序列化程序不必通过依赖项执行对象创建。

trans-unit.source: The delegate for this event is cleared immediately after serialization or deserialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的委托将在序列化或反序列化完成后立即清除。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when serialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when serialization or deserialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化或反序列化完成时引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Generally, serialization code is written to emit serialization data and does not typically require state-related checking and processing.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，序列化代码被编写为发出序列化数据，并且通常不要求与状态相关的检查和处理。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to maintain state data throughout serialization, data can be set and accessed by a serializer, which can listen to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.SerializationComplete> event, and clear the data after serialization.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要在整个序列化过程中保留状态数据，则可以通过序列化程序设置并访问这些数据，序列化程序可侦听 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.SerializationComplete> 事件，并在序列化之后清除这些数据。

trans-unit.source: Restoring the proper state after serialization can be important because serializers can be reused during serialization, and leftover state data or open streams might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 序列化可以很重要，因为序列化期间，可以重复使用序列化程序和剩余的状态数据或打开的流可能不正确后，请还原正确的状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a serializer needs to write to another file, such as a resource file, it is inefficient to design the serializer to close the file when finished.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果序列化程序需要写入到另一个文件，如资源文件是低效设计序列化程序完成后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: Serializing an object graph usually requires several serializers.
trans-unit.target: 序列化对象图通常需要多个序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The resource file would be opened and closed many times.
trans-unit.target: 将打开和关闭次数多的资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the resource file can be closed at the end of serialization by an object that listened to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.SerializationComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 相反，资源文件可以在序列化的末尾由关闭到侦听对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.SerializationComplete>事件。

trans-unit.source: The object instance to name.
trans-unit.target: 要命名的对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The name to give the instance.
trans-unit.target: 提供给实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the specified existing object.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的现有对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when it is necessary to create and then name an instance of an object without using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 需要创建并然后命名对象的实例，而无需使用时，此方法很有用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.CreateInstance%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken.
trans-unit.target: 如果试图重命名现有对象或者试图为新对象指定一个已被使用的名称，则将引发异常。
